game.name: Cleaning Raccrew
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cleaning Raccrew is a 4 player party game inspired by sumo, japanese game shows, and silly raccoon images!
